column5: Incredible location across from the San Antonio Museum of Art. A few minutes walk along the museum reach section of the river walk will bring you to the Pearl District and Hotel Emma with countless restaurants and bars including La Gloria. Within walking distance you'll find Paramour and Brooklynite making it hard to pass up a craft cocktail. Rosella Coffee is just steps away to help with your morning survival or shall we say revival?
column8: Industrial condo by the Pearl District Hotel Emma
